data.text: @Ninitosca @grannygilly16 I truly hope  not! but in 2018 about 80 % of congress is up for election. I hope they pay then
@ingrid_wien @grannygilly16 Will they reach the end of 2017??? I've never seen such imbecile measures and incompetence!
@Ninitosca @grannygilly16 hopefully everybody will hate them - that'd mean they'll be voted out of congress in 2018
@ingrid_wien @grannygilly16 to relish their wealth. It's a downward spiral to abiss. Everybody will hate them! 2/2
@Ninitosca @grannygilly16 everyone else is inferior and can be treated according to their prejudices. bleurgh
@Ninitosca @grannygilly16 true - but that's just the thought-train of their privileged white old men's club - bec they're rich, everyone 1/2
@ingrid_wien @grannygilly16 I don't see how they are going to further their wealth by abolishing LGBT rights... They won't survive 1/2
@Ninitosca @grannygilly16 because this man and his party are grade A morons who only want to further their wealth. abominable. grrrrrrrrrrrr
@ingrid_wien @grannygilly16 Why such incommensurable stupidity???? Science, human rights, common sense, why abolish what is evidently right?
